messages.content: SMAX refers to Service Management Automation X (SMAX), which is a cloud-based service management solution designed to automate and streamline IT and enterprise service management processes. It includes features such as incident management, service request management, change management, knowledge management, and asset management. SMAX is developed by Micro Focus, and it is designed to improve service delivery, reduce costs, and increase customer satisfaction.
